guide: To gain passively progress in this
you should have a pet equipped at all times.
Don't forget to use pet items that boost
their XP-gain. Things like Milestone Rewards
(Commission, Garden, Bestiary Milestones)
and Pet Candies will be a good help here.
To get easy progress in this do
contests like Wheat, Potato, Carrot
or Mushroom as those are easy
Bronze or Silver Medals to get.
For this you can participate in Arachne fights
in the Spiders Den, salvage Arachne/Spider Gear
or collect secrets in dungeons.
You can get easy contribution for
this by breaking some Wheat in the Hub.
If you want faster contribution,
make a Sugar Cane farm in your Garden.
Kill goblins or open loot chests in the Crystal Hollows,
then just throw them until you get a Golden Goblin.
Higher level eggs have higher chances of spawning,
but are also rarer to get.
You can also try to utilize one SkyMall perk for this.
Talk to the Blacksmith in the Hub
and gamble Reforges on an armor piece
until you get the Titanic Reforge.
You might need to bring some money for this.
You should either kill Endermen in
End using your Void Sword (200k) and
Ender Armor for this (buy the Ender Training
Perk from Tyzzo next to the Draconic Altar)
or Spiders in the Spiders Den with a Cleave 5
weapon. You might want to also use the free
Combat XP from Bestiary Miletones for this.
You can also grab the free Combat XP from
killing multiple different Mob Types
Buy a Dirt Bottle (100k) from
the Smithmonger in the Hub
and reforge an uncommon+ rarity weapon with it.
This unlocks at 1k Mushroom Collection.
You can get that by farming the Mushrooms
in the Mushroom Desert.
Obtain the needed Glowstone by buying a
Glowstone Block from the Builder and breaking
it on your island.
To help with this, try to make bigger crafts
by hand for Carpentry levels.
Also do your daily experiments and make sure
to have a pet active at all times
(any pet works, even level 100).
Hunting also counts for this.
Optimal tool:
Treecapitator with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Double-Bit or Lush
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
Costs 256 Enchanted Oak Wood to craft and
unlocks at Oak Wood Collection 9 (30k).
You should also consider getting gear from
Galatea like Canopy Armor (requires 1.21
to enter that island)

note: Gain 5 Strength from a Training Weight
guide: For this you'll want to grab a Training Weight
from a secret in dungeons and keep it in your
inventory till it shows a Strength bonus of +5.
Drop it once it reached that point.
This requires Catacombs Level 1 and
a completion of the previous floor.
You may need help from party finder
or friends for this.
Use the best rod you can in the Backwater Bayou
and use the Angler Set bought from the Fish Merchant
in the Hub. Also use the best bait you have access to.
Optimal tool:
Treecapitator with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Double-Bit or Lush
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
You should also consider getting gear from
Galatea like Canopy Armor (requires 1.21
to enter that island)
You can also place Minions for this, just
remember to give them the best fuel and storage
you have access to and collect in time.
This unlocks at 2.5k Raw Porkchop Collection
and requires 40 Enchanted Pork to make.
You can use Minions for this, just
remember to give them the best fuel and storage
you have access to and collect in time.
For this you'll need HotM 4 and a Goblin Egg.
Ideally you want help from others to find
The Queen and The Goblin King in the Crystal Hollows.
You then need to give the Egg to the King
and steal the Queen's Crystal.
You will most likely get this
from leveling up skills or
Auras Universal Income.
Remember to actually put the money
you get in the Bank :)
Craft a common Jerry Pet (1 Egg which has 30%
chance to drop from killing Chickens, and 8
Move Jerry) and upgrade it at Kat. It costs
750 coins and 1 Move Jerry and takes 10 seconds
to upgrade.
For this you'll need Mining 12 and a pickaxe.
Head to the Great Ice Wall and kill the
Glacite Walkers with your pickaxe.
Get yourself a splash, equip a Bingo Pet
and get the cake buff by eating the cakes
on skyerzz's or prtl's island.
If this doesn't finish it, get a Void Sword (200k) in the End
and hold it while some Ender Armor and/or Equipment.
You will most likely get this passively.
Use /be ingame to view your progress once you
talked to Bramass Beastslayer in The Spiders Den.
Do your daily Experimentation Tables
after getting Enchanting Level 10.
Recommended for this are:
Bingo, Rock, Grandma Wolf,
Pig, Enderman, Horse, Jerry,
Chicken, Silverfish, Bee,
Owl (2.2m coins) and Tarantula
Some of them require certain
collections and materials to craft.
Craft Farm Suit, Iron, Gold and Diamond Armor
